ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Stuff!
ygData.msgSnippet: So you guys use a point system?  I seem to remember talking about this in a thread a while back.  We have discussed using points on and off but it always comes
ygData.messageBody:
So you guys use a point system? I seem to remember talking about this in a
thread a while back. We have discussed using points on and off but it
always comes down to the fear that they won't be assigned uniformly and also
that nobody would want the responsibility of maintaining such a thing. We
use more of a deferment system.. aka peer pressure.. which seems to work
most of the time, though. Do you like the point system? Can you use point
for any item you want or does it have to be an item that is "clearly" for
your class?

Oh, and SW dropped that hammer, but one of those dang ogre-type shaman won
it! And we did not have such good luck with Hoshie this weekend, 2 wizards
do not a death squad make....

Halana, 57th "You have been slain by Hoshkar" Shaman
Tani "Monk Killer" Kaat, 35th Bard
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:garramone@...]
> Sent: Saturday, November 18, 2000 5:39 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] patch messed up my sound in EQ
>
>
> sweet, we got a pair of those shoes last night too. speaking
> of drops =)
> silly me, i went ahead and used some points on a Dragon Claw
> Main Gauche off
> SW (2 dropped, only myself and a ranger wanted them). i am
> very low on
> points after getting my SSS, so i just wanted something from VP just
> because, ya know to have SOMETHING hehe, not that this sword
> ain't nice.
> so then next thing i know Hosh comes along and i use some
> more points on a
> Veldrak's Shortblade! (no one wanted it) now i don't know
> which to use!
> (have to keep SSS in primary hand). ya i know i got it rough =p
>
> SW drops a nice hammer for ya Halana, good luck in there.
>
> Shada
>
> > My online
> > monk hubby (hush all you eq-love cynics!) got some great
> > haste slippers.. us
> > shaman are hoping for something equally as good for us!
> >
> > Good luck to you this weekend and my you have some
> uber-bard drops!!!
> >
> > Halana, 57th Shaman
> > Tani, 35th Bard
> > Solusek Ro
